ygData.subject: Re: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: Kithicor scary?? Errr.....I always thought Kith was pretty damn boring. As for scary, who is scared when you are running faster than anything else in Norrath
ygData.messageBody:
Kithicor scary?? Errr.....I always thought Kith was pretty damn boring. As
for scary, who is scared when you are running faster than anything else in
Norrath can.

Kith rocks now. Great outdoor zone for lvl 30+. It's about time.



> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Gahk! Have you been in Kith since the patch??? They have totally NERFED
> it!
>
> It nearly completely light in there! WTF? Man I needed some spell to
cloud
> my vision! Granted I do got my clipping plane set to max viewing
distance
> but come on now - this is ridiculous!
>
> Ugh - ugh - ugh what are they doing??
>
> It used to be one of the most totally scary zones we had. Even if there
> were no really bad mobs in there (after level 20/25 when ghouls go green)
it
> was still scary - dark, foggy, ucky noises and all.
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> <Spirit of the Moon>
> Bard of the 35th song <yes still - hell hell hell>
> somewhere on Innoruuk
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
